TextEng: Someone decided to throw a party?
Do you usually have to put up with that?
Is he drunk?
What's the matter with him?
No. The school was nearly destroyed and Drogan lies near death.
Text: 아니. 학교가 거의 파괴됐고 드로건 스승님은 죽기 직전이야.

TextEng: There was nothing I couldn't handle, but Drogan was poisoned.
Text: 내가 못 처리할 건 없었는데 드로건 스승님이 독에 당했어.

TextEng: We were attacked by the kobolds and Master Drogan has been poisoned.
Text: 코볼트들한테 습격당했고 드로건 스승님이 독에 중독됐어.

TextEng: If I can help Drogan, then maybe he could help you.
Text: 내가 드로건 스승님을 도울 수 있다면 스승님이 당신을 도울 수 있을지도.

TextEng: I have problems of my own to worry about.
That is all. Goodbye.
I could use a little encouragement.
I need some herbs to help Drogan.
Text: 드로건 스승님을 돕기 위해 약초가 필요해.

TextEng: I met a man called Szaren.
It is foolish of you to drive him away.
I think you should let him stay.
Text: 그를 머물게 해야 할 것 같아.

TextEng: He was hoping you would reconsider his proposition.
Text: 당신이 그의 제안을 다시 생각해 주길 바라더라.

TextEng: I didn't know the Red Wizards are evil.
I have spoken to Szaren in length, and I think he should stay.
Text: 자렌과 길게 얘기해 봤는데 그가 머물러야 할 것 같아.

TextEng: I shall go speak to him some more, so that I can make an informed decision.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> If you don't let the wizard stay, the mayor might have an accident.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 그 마법사를 안 머물게 하면 시장한테 사고가 생길 수도 있어.

TextEng: <StartAction>[Persuade - Intimidate]</Start> Listen Haniah, you let Szaren stay or Veraunt dies!
Text: <StartAction>[설득 - 위협]</Start> 들어 하니아, 자렌을 머물게 해. 안 그러면 베라운트가 죽어!

TextEng: <StartAction>[Leave]</Start>
Sorry, I only meant that in jest.
<StartAction>[Cast Charm]</Start>  Szaren is an ally and should remain here in Hilltop.
Text: <StartAction>[매혹 시전]</Start> 자렌은 아군이야. 힐탑에 머물러야 해.

TextEng: He may stay...
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Szaren only wishes to bring us prosperity.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 자렌은 우리에게 번영을 가져다주고 싶을 뿐이야.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Hilltop would be better defended from attacks if the Red Wizards were here.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 붉은 마법사단이 여기 있으면 힐탑이 공격에 더 잘 방어될 거야.

TextEng: You are making a big mistake, Haniah.
I will tell him of your decision.
I shall make him leave a swiftly as possible.
About Piper...
Fine, tell me about your problems.
Text: 좋아 무슨 문제가 있는지 말해 봐.

TextEng: I am here to help you, Haniah.
What are these problems you are having?
Does he make a lot of these predictions?
This is your problem? A fool of a doomsayer?
Let me guess, Hol was killed by the kobolds.
I have no time to deal with a lunatic.
What if he really is a prophet?
What would you pay me to solve this problem for you?
Text: 이 문제를 해결하면 뭘 줄 건데?

TextEng: Perhaps we could meet somewhere private to discuss... payment.
Text: 어딘가 둘만 있는 데서 만나서... 보상에 대해 얘기해 볼까?

TextEng: You are being too vague. Name a sum or forget my help.
Text: 너무 애매하네. 금액을 말하든가 도움은 잊어.

TextEng: I do nothing for kindness, Haniah. Speak to me with gold.
Text: 친절은 공짜가 아니야 하니아. 금화로 말해.

TextEng: I guess I can help you.
I will speak to Piper for you.
That's all. Goodbye.
I could use a little encouragement.
I need some herbs to help Drogan.
Text: 드로건 스승님을 돕기 위해 약초가 필요해.

TextEng: I have spoken to Szaren again.
I met a man called Szaren.
It is foolish of you to drive him away.
I think you should let him stay.
Text: 그를 머물게 해야 할 것 같아.

TextEng: He was hoping you would reconsider his proposition.
Text: 당신이 그의 제안을 다시 생각해 주길 바라더라.

TextEng: Tell me about your problems.
Not yet, but I'm working on it.
How is everything going?
I will go see about Piper.
Piper is no longer a problem.
Goodbye.
No, I don't think so.
I just wanted you to know that Drogan is well.
Text: 드로건 스승님이 괜찮다는 걸 알려주려고 왔어.

TextEng: I met a man called Szaren.
Fine, I will tell him to leave.
Fine. Goodbye.
